Articles.Content: I am wondering if anyone has any suggestions for visual mods. I have noticed in ksp videos that visual mods tend to be buggy and break textures, is there any way I can avoid this?

SVE if you can handle it. 

EVE dosen't take much imo. It just adds clouds, and the settings can be tweaked. 

Scatterer is also nice if you can run it. 

 

Sorry I don't have links, my eyes are so tired I can't keep them open.
Goodnight.
If you dont have a good PC you can try SCI-fi visual enhasment:https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/151190-14sci-fi-visual-enchancements-v-14-high-performance-alt-to-sve/
